name: multi-links
title: Open Multiple Links
description: Opens all the links from the selected text in the default browser
author: wrick17

commands.name: multi-links
commands.title: Open Multiple Links
commands.description: Opens all the links from the selected text in the default browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
